film.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Mugen Ressha-Hen
film.description: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.
film.stars: Natsuki Hanae, Akari Kitô, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka

film.title: Mortal Kombat
film.description: MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe.
film.writer: Greg Russo (screenplay by), Dave Callaham (screenplay by)
film.stars: Lewis Tan, Jessica McNamee, Josh Lawson

film.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
film.description: The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against one another - the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong - with humanity caught in the balance.
film.writer: Terry Rossio (story by), Michael Dougherty (story by)
film.stars: Alexander Skarsgård, Millie Bobby Brown, Rebecca Hall

film.title: Separation
film.description: A young girl finds solace in her artist father and the ghost of her dead mother.
film.stars: Madeline Brewer, Rupert Friend, Brian Cox

film.title: Raya and the Last Dragon
film.description: In a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon.
film.writer: Qui Nguyen (screenplay by), Adele Lim (screenplay by)
film.stars: Kelly Marie Tran, Awkwafina, Gemma Chan

film.title: Nobody
film.description: A bystander who intervenes to help a woman being harassed by a group of men becomes the target of a vengeful drug lord.
film.stars: Bob Odenkirk, Aleksey Serebryakov, Connie Nielsen

film.title: The Unholy
film.description: A hearing-impaired girl is visited by the Virgin Mary and can suddenly hear, speak, and heal the sick. As people flock to witness her miracles, terrifying events unfold. Are they the work of the Virgin Mary or something much more sinister?
film.writer: Evan Spiliotopoulos (written for the screen by), James Herbert (based upon the book Shrine by)
film.stars: Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Cricket Brown, William Sadler

film.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
film.description: In a magically realistic version of Toronto, a young man must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes one by one in order to win her heart.
film.stars: Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Kieran Culkin

film.title: Tom and Jerry
film.description: A chaotic battle ensues between Jerry Mouse, who has taken refuge in the Royal Gate Hotel, and Tom Cat, who is hired to drive him away before the day of a big wedding arrives.
film.writer: William Hanna (based on characters created by), Joseph Barbera (based on characters created by)
film.stars: Chloë Grace Moretz, Michael Peña, Colin Jost

film.title: Together Together
film.description: When a young loner becomes the gestational surrogate for a single man in his 40s, the two strangers come to realize this unexpected relationship will challenge their perceptions of connection, boundaries and the particulars of love.
film.stars: Patti Harrison, Ed Helms, Rosalind Chao

tv.title: Planet Earth II
tv.description: Wildlife documentary series with David Attenborough, beginning with a look at the remote islands which offer sanctuary to some of the planet's rarest creatures, to the beauty of cities, which are home to humans, and animals.

tv.title: Planet Earth
tv.description: Emmy Award-winning, 11 episodes, five years in the making, the most expensive nature documentary series ever commissioned by the BBC, and the first to be filmed in high definition.
tv.stars: David Attenborough, Sigourney Weaver, Thomas Anguti Johnston

tv.title: Band of Brothers
tv.description: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division, and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord, through V-J Day.
tv.stars: Scott Grimes, Damian Lewis, Ron Livingston

tv.title: Breaking Bad
tv.description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.
tv.stars: Bryan Cranston, Aaron Paul, Anna Gunn

tv.title: Chernobyl
tv.description: In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.
tv.stars: Jessie Buckley, Jared Harris, Stellan Skarsgård

tv.title: Blue Planet II
tv.description: David Attenborough returns to the world's oceans in this sequel to the acclaimed documentary filming rare and unusual creatures of the deep, as well as documenting the problems our oceans face.
tv.stars: David Attenborough, Peter Drost, Roger Horrocks

tv.title: The Wire
tv.description: The Baltimore drug scene, as seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.
tv.stars: Dominic West, Lance Reddick, Sonja Sohn

tv.title: Our Planet
tv.description: Documentary series focusing on the breadth of the diversity of habitats around the world, from the remote Arctic wilderness and mysterious deep oceans to the vast landscapes of Africa and diverse jungles of South America.

tv.title: Cosmos: A Spacetime Odyssey
tv.description: An exploration of our discovery of the laws of nature and coordinates in space and time.
tv.stars: Neil deGrasse Tyson, Stoney Emshwiller, Piotr Michael

tv.title: Cosmos
tv.description: Astronomer Carl Sagan leads us on an engaging guided tour of the various elements and cosmological theories of the universe.
tv.writer: Ann Druyan, Carl Sagan, Steven Soter
tv.stars: Carl Sagan, Jaromír Hanzlík, Jonathan Fahn
